body: Very wholesome
This is... a true wholesome shotacon i've looking for :sniff: i don't care about the dark parts, all that's important is that she's happy now
Very potato.

@culturedmen Do you realize the bandages in her face and arm are the reason why the MC asks her what's going on and she says her now ex boyfriend dumped her and hit her? It's literally explained, what are you even talking about?😭😂And of course she's smoking outside work. What were you expecting her to do, smoke inside the cafe? She may be smoking because she's stressed, but that's nothing strange enough. lmao people looking for the stupidest things just to say something is not wholesome. It's true that the sex part could have more to it though. I personally thought that she wanted him to unburden himself with her (I'm not sure if she really loved him or just liked him and wanted to help him, but regardless, her intentions seem good and now they're living together, be it friendship or romantic; probably the latter) Overall, she probably was tired and stressed and the MC was just the help she needed too. In the end everything works out and happy ending, that's it, don't try to twist it
One of the best there is...
I agree with the guy under me, there's definitely some darker undertones in this. Great hentai though.

Everyone keeps saying its wholesome but there's some dark undertones hidden in here. Example: Her eyes are clearly tired either from crying or sleep deprivation and it becomes more evident since she was smoking outside work. There's bandage in her left wrist meaning she could be causing harm to herself. There's also bandaid on het face maybe she got hit in the face by someone and lastly she's so casual with sex that it looks like she doesnt think it matters anymore

Damn the power level of bullshit is here is insane

So chick has a abuse relationship, works a shit job, has sleep problems, and smokes. No even counting the clear psychology and mental problems tied with this issues. Basically has her prince charming sweep her off her feet and give her what appears to be a happy or better life. So yeah that should equal this to be wholesome.

Ps sorry for my bad english. I just hope ya know what u mean ^^'.

It's also just an opinion and subjective interpretation and not a objective fact.

I just really enjoyed to red it and think this manga Doujin with so much effort putted in should appear more often.

I know most of you just read it for the fap  and think "thus sh*tss weeaboo put to much effort for to explain some cartoon porn comic s*it."


But I tbh love it If an Artist put some good effort in something like this in int. 

This type of porn is always profitable and big

but damn it's soooo fuck*ng much huge repetitive shit "I mena  yea this kind if story isn't that new but I hope you get my point" with too much unnecessary text out there. Sometimes I think most arist don't know how powerful a Manga could be if they put more effort im the small details and don't tread it like  visual novels or Light novels with just more images!

I like storys like this!

Short, cute not too complex but complex enough and everything makes kinda senses 

How she is sitting outside alone on a stair, smoking a cigarette and with these eye rings. She eventually doesn't have a easy life within a, bad relationship, don't get enough sleep and bad payed job . See her room as an example for it!

Tv, bed, frige and sink in one room? I'ts not much stuff just all waht she need.

She couldn't also be a prostitute, because this kind of outfit is common in maid coffees im japan. Also would she have a better living room because they get far more better charged than some people who work fulltime in a job where most person mostly can do as a part-time job.


The Artis did a great job to explain also about the character just with the aperiance, location and presentation.  You don't need always just text to explain a kind and cute story.

I wish more Doujinjshi artist would put more effort in their works qnd make it a bit more.

For those of you who perceive this as wholesome, congrats! You still have a lil' bit pureness in your heart. Personal opinion, the way she looks and the way she doesn't talk much makes me think that she will commit suicide or die
